### Fast Youtube Search

A simple and fast youtube video search by title.
Created by Lm Only.

### Usage

```js
const yts = require('fast-yt-search');

//Tste mode
(async () => {
    try {
        //Search by title
        const results = await yts('Hutao Genshin');
        
         //Console Output
         console.log(results);
    } catch (erro) {
        console.error(erro);
    }
})();
```
